Rick Sanville
Upper Peninsula Family Solutions
285 Bishop Woods Road
Marquette, MI 49855
RE: Application #: CB520304693
Upper Peninsula Family Solutions
285 Bishop Woods Road
Marquette, MI 49855
Dear Mr. Sanville:
Attached is the Original Licensing Study Report for the above referenced facility. The
study has determined substantial compliance with applicable licensing statutes and
administrative rules. Therefore, a provisional license is issued.
Please review the enclosed documentation for accuracy and feel free to contact me with
any questions. In the event that I am not available and you need to speak to someone
immediately, please feel free to contact Deborah L. Clark, Area Manager, at (906) 228-
2852.
Sincerely,
Don Collier, Licensing Consultant
Bureau of Children and Adult Licensing
Suite 11
701 S. Elmwood
Traverse City, MI 49684
(231) 922-5305

MICHIGAN DEPARTMENT OF HUMAN SERVICES
BUREAU OF CHILDREN AND ADULT LICENSING
LICENSING STUDY REPORT
I. IDENTIFYING INFORMATION
License #: CB520304693
Applicant Name: Upper Peninsula Family Solutions
Applicant Address: 285 Bishop Woods Road
Marquette, MI 49855
Applicant Telephone #: (906) 228-2267
Administrator/Licensee Designee: Rick Sanville
Name of Facility: Upper Peninsula Family Solutions
Facility Address: 285 Bishop Woods Road
Marquette, MI 49855
Facility Telephone #: (906) 228-2267
Application Date: 08/24/2009
Capacity: NA
Program Type: CHILD PLACING AGENCY, PRIVATE
1

II. METHODOLOGY
08/24/2009 Enrollment
11/09/2009 Contact-Face to Face
On-site Inspection- Full Compliance
III. DESCRIPTION OF FINDINGS & CONCLUSIONS
A. Physical Description of Facility
Upper Peninsula Family Solutions is located at 285 Bishop Woods Road, Marquette, MI
49855 which is a private residence. The proposed Child Placing Agency will occupy 2
second floor rooms in the residence. The office room is a 168 square foot room
containing office furniture, a fax/copier, computer, and telephone. The meeting room is
a 500 square foot room across from the office room. The plan is to use the meeting
room and office in the private residence to meet with families until the Child Welfare
business is such to rent office space. The private residence is located in a subdivision of
upscale homes in Marquette Township about 3 miles from the center of Marquette. The
private residence is approximately 4500 square feet.
B. Program Description
Upper Peninsula Family Solutions is applying for licensure as a Child Placing Agency to
do Foster Home Certification, Foster Care Placements, Supervise Independent Living,
Adoption Evaluations, and Adoptions Placements. The agency is applying with 2
proposed staff members and plan to expand the staff as business expands. Upper
Peninsula Family Solutions is a non-profit organization to serve children and families in
the Upper Peninsula of Michigan. The two person staff meets the established
qualifications set by R 400.12205. The current plan is to provide adoption services to
children currently in Michigan Child Welfare System.
C. Rule/Statutory Violations
Upper Peninsula Family Solutions is in full compliance with all Child Placing Agency’s
rules that can be assessed prior to obtaining a Child Placing Agency license. Upper
Peninsula Family Solutions has all of the required policies and clearances for an
Original Six Month Provisional License. Upper Peninsula Family Solutions has the intent
to be in compliance with Child Placing Agency rules once licensed.
2

IV. RECOMMENDATION
I recommend the issuance of an original six month Child Placing Agency license.
11/19/2009
________________________________________
Don Collier Date
